label: 員外官
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Officials not to be found in the government system as laid down in the Taihō Civil (Taihō-ryō) and Penal Code (Taihō-ritsu ). These officials received salaries, but had no real official duties. There were Irregular Provincial Officials (Ingai-kokushi ), such as the Irregular Governors (Ingai-kami ), and Irregular Governor-Generals (Ingai-sotsu ), and many other kinds of irregular officials.　[大宝令、大宝律、員外国司、員外守、員外帥]
